rules.natural: Provided that facility1 exports substance1, substance1 is approved for export.
If facility1 exports substance1, then substance1 passes testing.
In the event that facility1 develops substance1, either facility1 produces substance1 or facility1 is profitable.
Should facility1 research substance1, then either facility1 produces substance1 or facility1 is profitable.
Given that facility1 has quality control, if facility1 is not inspected, then facility1 is operational.
Assuming facility1 violates regulations, then if facility1 is not inspected, facility1 is not compliant.
In cases where facility1 follows regulations, then if facility1 is not inspected, facility1 is not compliant.
Whenever person1 reports a violation at facility1, facility1 violates regulations.
Person1 reports a violation at facility1 or person1 reports compliance at facility1.
If person1 is a whistleblower, then if it is not the case that (if person1 reports compliance at facility1 then facility1 follows regulations), facility1 is investigated.
Should facility1 be audited, then facility1 is approved.
In the event that facility1 is reviewed, facility1 is approved.
If facility1 is condemned, then facility1 is cleared.
Provided that person1 finds violations at facility1, facility1's license is not revoked.
Whenever facility1 is approved, facility1 is profitable.
Assuming person1 finds compliance at facility1, facility1's license is not revoked.
If person1 is an inspector, then either person1 finds violations at facility1 or person1 finds compliance at facility1.
Should substance1 pass testing, then substance1 is safe.
Provided that substance1 is safe, substance1 meets standards.
If facility1 is inspected, then facility1 is approved.
Facility1 is fined, or facility1 is shutdown, or if facility1 is not inspected, then facility1 is not compliant.
Whenever facility1 is certified, facility1 is licensed.
If it is not the case that (facility1 produces substance1 or facility1 is profitable), then substance1 is contaminated.
In the event that it is not the case that (facility1 produces substance1 or facility1 is profitable), then substance1 is not contaminated.
Assuming it is not the case that (facility1 develops substance1 or facility1 researches substance1), then facility1 abandons substance1.
Should it not be the case that (facility1 develops substance1 or facility1 researches substance1), then facility1 does not abandon substance1.
In cases where it is not the case that (if person1 reports compliance at facility1 then facility1 follows regulations), facility1 is not investigated.
Whenever it is not the case that (facility1 is audited or facility1 is reviewed), facility1 is condemned.
Should it not be the case that (facility1 is audited or facility1 is reviewed), then facility1 is not cleared.
In the event that it is not the case that (facility1's license is renewed or, if facility1 is not profitable, then facility1 is licensed), facility1's license is revoked.
Provided that facility1 is not inspected, facility1 is compliant.
Assuming facility1 is not inspected, facility1 is not operational.
In cases where facility1 is not profitable, facility1 exports substance1.
If facility1 is not profitable, then facility1 is certified.
